= searchcount =

Count of results for a search query.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| q        || required   || Search query string. ([QuerySyntax query syntax]) ||
|| window  || optional   || Time window for results. (default: `a` Options: `auto` - automatically pick the most relevant window. `h` last hour, `d` last day, `w` last week, `m` last month, `a` all time ||

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/searchcount.json?q=Barack+Obama
}}}

This will fetch only the search result counts in json format for a query of "Barack Obama".
